013package org.apache.juneau.bean.openapi3;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ConverterUtils.*;
017
018import java.net.*;
019import java.util.*;
020
021import org.apache.juneau.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
025
026/**
027 * TODO
028 */
029@Bean(properties="contentType,style,explode,headers,allowReserved,*")
030@FluentSetters
031public class Encoding extends OpenApiElement{
032
033   private String contentType,
034         style;
035   private Map<String,HeaderInfo> headers;
036   private Boolean explode,
037         allowReserved;
038
039   /**
040    * Default constructor.
041    */
042   public Encoding() { }
043
044   /**
045    * Copy constructor.
046    *
047    * @param copyFrom The object to copy.
048    */
049   public Encoding(Encoding copyFrom) {
050      super(copyFrom);
051
052      this.contentType = copyFrom.contentType;
053      this.style = copyFrom.style;
054      this.explode = copyFrom.explode;
055      this.allowReserved = copyFrom.allowReserved;
056      this.headers = copyOf(copyFrom.headers, HeaderInfo::copy);
057   }
058
059   /**
060    * Make a deep copy of this object.
061    *
062    * @return A deep copy of this object.
063    */
064   public Encoding copy() {
065      return new Encoding(this);
066   }
067
068   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
069   protected Encoding strict() {
070      super.strict();
071      return this;
072   }
073
074   /**
075    * Bean property getter:  <property>contentType</property>.
076    *
077    * <p>
078    * The URL pointing to the contact information.
079    *
080    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
081    */
082   public String getContentType() {
083      return contentType;
084   }
085
086   /**
087    * Bean property setter:  <property>url</property>.
088    *
089    * <p>
090    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
091    * <br>Strings must be valid URIs.
092    *
093    * <p>
094    * URIs defined by {@link UriResolver} can be used for values.
095    *
096    * @param value
097    *    The new value for this property.
098    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
099    * @return This object
100    */
101   public Encoding setContentType(String value) {
102      contentType = value;
103      return this;
104   }
105
106   /**
107    * Bean property getter:  <property>style</property>.
108    *
109    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
110    */
111   public String getStyle() {
112      return style;
113   }
114
115   /**
116    * Bean property setter:  <property>description</property>.
117    *
118    * @param value
119    *    The new value for this property.
120    * @return This object
121    */
122   public Encoding setStyle(String value) {
123      style = value;
124      return this;
125   }
126
127   /**
128    * Bean property getter:  <property>variables</property>.
129    *
130    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
131    */
132   public Map<String, HeaderInfo> getHeaders() {
133      return headers;
134   }
135
136   /**
137    * Bean property setter:  <property>variables</property>.
138    *
139    * @param value
140    *    The new value for this property.
141    * @return This object
142    */
143   public Encoding setHeaders(Map<String, HeaderInfo> value) {
144      headers = copyOf(value);
145      return this;
146   }
147
148   /**
149    * Adds one or more values to the <property>headers</property> property.
150    *
151    * @param key The mapping key.
152    * @param value
153    *    The values to add to this property.
154    *    <br>Ignored if <jk>null</jk>.
155    * @return This object
156    */
157   public Encoding addHeader(String key, HeaderInfo value) {
158      headers = mapBuilder(headers).sparse().add(key, value).build();
159      return this;
160   }
161
162   /**
163    * Bean property getter:  <property>required</property>.
164    *
165    * <p>
166    * The type of the object.
167    *
168    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
169    */
170   public Boolean getExplode() {
171      return explode;
172   }
173
174   /**
175    * Bean property setter:  <property>explode</property>.
176    *
177    * <p>
178    * The type of the object.
179    *
180    * @param value
181    *    The new value for this property.
182    *    <br>Property value is required.
183    *    </ul>
184    * @return This object
185    */
186   public Encoding setExplode(Boolean value) {
187      explode = value;
188      return this;
189   }
190
191   /**
192    * Bean property getter:  <property>required</property>.
193    *
194    * <p>
195    * The type of the object.
196    *
197    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
198    */
199   public Boolean getAllowReserved() {
200      return allowReserved;
201   }
202
203   /**
204    * Bean property setter:  <property>explode</property>.
205    *
206    * <p>
207    * The type of the object.
208    *
209    * @param value
210    *    The new value for this property.
211    *    <br>Property value is required.
212    *    </ul>
213    * @return This object
214    */
215   public Encoding setAllowReserved(Boolean value) {
216      allowReserved = value;
217      return this;
218   }
219
220   // <FluentSetters>
221
222   // </FluentSetters>
223
224   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
225   public <T> T get(String property, Class<T> type) {
226      if (property == null)
227         return null;
228      return switch (property) {
229         case "contentType" -> toType(getContentType(), type);
230         case "style" -> toType(getStyle(), type);
231         case "headers" -> toType(getHeaders(), type);
232         case "explode" -> toType(getExplode(), type);
233         case "allowReserved" -> toType(getAllowReserved(), type);
234         default -> super.get(property, type);
235      };
236   }
237
238   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
239   public Encoding set(String property, Object value) {
240      if (property == null)
241         return this;
242      return switch (property) {
243         case "contentType" -> setContentType(Utils.s(value));
244         case "style" -> setStyle(Utils.s(value));
245         case "headers" -> setHeaders(mapBuilder(String.class,HeaderInfo.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
246         case "explode" -> setExplode(toBoolean(value));
247         case "allowReserved" -> setAllowReserved(toBoolean(value));
248         default -> {
249            super.set(property, value);
250            yield this;
251         }
252      };
253   }
254
255   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
256   public Set<String> keySet() {
257      var s = setBuilder(String.class)
258         .addIf(contentType != null, "contentType")
259         .addIf(style != null, "style")
260         .addIf(headers != null, "headers")
261         .addIf(explode != null, "explode")
262         .addIf(allowReserved != null, "allowReserved")
263         .build();
264      return new MultiSet<>(s, super.keySet());
265   }
266}
